<a id="AudioEffect"></a>

# AudioEffect

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [AudioEffectAmplify](AudioEffectAmplify.md), [AudioEffectCapture](AudioEffectCapture.md), [AudioEffectChorus](AudioEffectChorus.md), [AudioEffectCompressor](AudioEffectCompressor.md), [AudioEffectDelay](AudioEffectDelay.md), [AudioEffectDistortion](AudioEffectDistortion.md), [AudioEffectEQ](AudioEffectEQ.md), [AudioEffectFilter](AudioEffectFilter.md), [AudioEffectHardLimiter](AudioEffectHardLimiter.md), [AudioEffectLimiter](AudioEffectLimiter.md), [AudioEffectPanner](AudioEffectPanner.md), [AudioEffectPhaser](AudioEffectPhaser.md), [AudioEffectPitchShift](AudioEffectPitchShift.md), [AudioEffectRecord](AudioEffectRecord.md), [AudioEffectReverb](AudioEffectReverb.md), [AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzer](AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzer.md), [AudioEffectStereoEnhance](AudioEffectStereoEnhance.md)

Base class for audio effect resources.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The base [Resource](Resource.md) for every audio effect. In the editor, an audio effect can be added to the current bus layout through the Audio panel. At run-time, it is also possible to manipulate audio effects through [AudioServer.add_bus_effect()](AudioServer.md#AudioServer_method_add_bus_effect), [AudioServer.remove_bus_effect()](AudioServer.md#AudioServer_method_remove_bus_effect), and [AudioServer.get_bus_effect()](AudioServer.md#AudioServer_method_get_bus_effect).

When applied on a bus, an audio effect creates a corresponding [AudioEffectInstance](AudioEffectInstance.md). The instance is directly responsible for manipulating the sound, based on the original audio effect's properties.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="AudioEffect_private_method__instantiate"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[AudioEffectInstance](AudioEffectInstance.md) **_instantiate**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffect_private_method__instantiate)

Override this method to customize the [AudioEffectInstance](AudioEffectInstance.md) created when this effect is applied on a bus in the editor's Audio panel, or through [AudioServer.add_bus_effect()](AudioServer.md#AudioServer_method_add_bus_effect).

```
    extends AudioEffect

    @export var strength = 4.0

    func _instantiate():
        var effect = CustomAudioEffectInstance.new()
        effect.base = self

        return effect
```


\ **Note:** It is recommended to keep a reference to the original **AudioEffect** in the new instance. Depending on the implementation this allows the effect instance to listen for changes at run-time and be modified accordingly.
